verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: You are to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than <S%H5892>yourself<s%>, cities <S%H1419>great<s%> and fenced <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>, whom you <S%H3045>know<s%>, and of whom you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3320>say<s%>, Who can stand <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>!

<S%H3045>Understand<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he which goes <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H398>you<s%>; as a consuming <S%H784>fire<s%> he shall <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3665>them<s%>, and he shall bring them down before your <S%H6440>face<s%>: so shall you drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly<s%>, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has said unto <S%H1696>you<s%>.

<S%H559>Speak<s%> not you in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, after that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has cast them <S%H1920>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, For my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has brought me <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%>: but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

Not for your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, or for the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, do you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>: but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6965>you<s%>, and that he may perform the <S%H1697>word<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

<S%H3045>Understand<s%> <S%H3068>therefore<s%>, that the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you not this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it for your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; for you are a <S%H6203>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, and <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>not<s%>, how you provokedst the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you did depart <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, until you <S%H935>came<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, you have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Also in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> you <S%H7107>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%>, so that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with you to have destroyed <S%H8045>you<s%>.

When I was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, even the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H3427>you<s%>, then I lived in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, I neither did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto me <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and on them was written according to all the <S%H1697>words<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with you in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, even the <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6965>me<s%>, Arise, get you <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from <S%H5971>here<s%>; for your people which you have brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H4118>themselves<s%>; they are quickly turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>; they have made them a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>.
Furthermore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H6203>and<s%>, behold, it is a stiffnecked <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Let me <S%H7503>alone<s%>, that I may <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H4229>them<s%>, and blot out their <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> you a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6099>mightier<s%> and greater than <S%H7227>they<s%>.

So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were in my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H2398>and<s%>, behold, you had sinned against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and had <S%H6213>made<s%> you a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%>: you had turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>.

And I <S%H8610>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out <S%H5921>of<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H7665>broke<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>: I did neither <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, because of all your <S%H2403>sins<s%> which you <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>wickedly<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

For I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> and hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>, with which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> against you to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>. But the Lord <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto me at that time <S%H6471>also<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H6419>him<s%>: and I prayed for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> also the same <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%>, the <S%H5695>calf<s%> which you had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H3807>stamped<s%> <S%H2912>it<s%>, and ground it very <S%H3190>small<s%>, even until it was as <S%H1854>small<s%> as <S%H6083>dust<s%>: and I <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> there into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that descended <S%H3381>out<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.
And at <S%H8404>Taberah<s%>, and at <S%H4532>Massah<s%>, and at <S%H6914>Kibroth<s%>–hattaavah, you provoked the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%>.

Likewise when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you from <S%H6947>Kadesh<s%>–barnea, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4784>you<s%>; then you rebelled against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and you <S%H539>believed<s%> him <S%H8085>not<s%>, nor listened to his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
You have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I knew <S%H3045>you<s%>.

Thus I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, as I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H3068>first<s%>; because the Lord had <S%H559>said<s%> he would destroy <S%H8045>you<s%>.

I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> therefore unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, <S%H7843>destroy<s%> not your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> through your <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, which you have brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; <S%H6437>look<s%> not unto the <S%H7190>stubbornness<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, nor to their <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, nor to their <S%H2403>sin<s%>:

Lest the <S%H776>land<s%> from where you brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H8135>them<s%>, and because he hated <S%H3318>them<s%>, he has brought them out to <S%H4191>kill<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Yet they are your <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which you brought <S%H3318>out<s%> by your <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by your stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>.
